name: volt-absorb

effect.x_y: Does not absorb non-damaging electric moves, i.e. thunder wave.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Does not absorb non-damaging electric moves, i.e. thunder wave.

short_effect: Absorbs electric moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.

flavor_text.x_y: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.
